Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Encoders

package BobcatLib.Hardware.Encoders
Generic encoder implementation , currently includes Thrifty and CanCoders , would need to integrate more like the CanAndCoder , once wpilib2025 supports them
  • Class
    Description
    BaseEncoder
    A base class for interacting with an encoder using the EncoderIO interface.
    CanCoderWrapper
    A wrapper class for managing a CANcoder device, implementing the EncoderIO interface.
    EncoderConstants
    Holds constants related to the configuration of an encoder.
    EncoderIO
    Interface representing the interface to encoder hardware, providing methods for configuring, reading, and managing encoder values and faults.
    EncoderIO.EncoderIOInputs
    Represents the inputs for the gyro sensor used in the encoder system.
    ThriftyAbsoluteEncoder
    The ThriftyAbsoluteEncoder class implements the EncoderIO interface and provides methods for working with an absolute encoder connected via analog input.
